original_text: You cannot do that for them when they sit in their caves. You cannot help them as they hide in the bushes, ready to attack other animals. You cannot help them as they hide in the bushes, ready to attack other animals. You cannot do that for them
korean_text: 그것들이 굴에 엎드리며 숲에 앉아 숨어 기다리느니라

sentences.original_text: You cannot do that for them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 위해 그렇게 할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: when they sit in their caves
as they hide in the bushes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 덤불 속에 숨어 있을 때
